His sports lessons (4) 题目内容: What kind of hair does Ben have? 选项: A. Long black hair B. Short black hair C. Short brown hair D. Long brown hair
ques_analyze: 这篇描写了本和他最好的朋友哈利的故事，涵盖了他们的年龄、住址、学校生活、外貌特点和兴趣爱好。(1) 推理判断题。短文提到哈利不喜欢运动，但本喜欢运动，这说明他们的兴趣不同，因此无法得知他们喜欢相同的事物，选D。 (2) 细节理解题。根据短文中的“住在我家附近”这句话，我们知道本和哈利住得很近，所以选A。 (3) 细节理解题。根据本在短文中说的“我帮他做英语作业”，我们可以得知本帮助哈利的是英语作业，因此选C。 (4) 细节理解题。根据短文描述“哈利的头发长，而我的头发短”，可以确认本有短黑发，选B。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: There are many hobby-related websites on the Internet. The camping site and the chess site are two of them. Although these two hobbies are very different, they are both very popular with young people. Why? One reason why camping is popular is that it is affordable. There are different campgrounds around the world. Some campgrounds have indoor swimming pools, restaurants, and game rooms, while others don't even have water! But the scenery around campgrounds is usually beautiful. Camping is relaxing. Campers can make breakfast with friends or family in the morning. They can spend the day swimming, fishing, climbing mountains, and observing wildlife. Campers usually sleep well at night. And what about chess? It is popular now, but in the past, not many young people played this game. Many young people started to like chess after watching the first Harry Potter movie. Many stars also enjoy playing chess. Bono, Moby, and Sting are all good at it. Young people often imitate what stars do, even if it's playing chess! More and more students are learning this game. Many schools have chess clubs. People can also play chess on computers, either against the computer or against people from other parts of the world. You can even play chess while camping! (1) 露营者露营时感觉如何？选项: A. Relaxed B. Tired C. Sleepy D. Strong (2) Sting的职业可能是什么？选项: A. A chess teacher B. A reader of Harry Potter C. A great camper D. A good singer (3) 这篇文章的最佳标题是什么？选项: A. Camping and Chess Clubs B. Do as Big Stars Do C. Young People's Hobbies D. Hobbies and Hobby Sites
ques_analyze: 文章描述了很多年轻人喜欢的爱好和相关的网络平台，特别说明了露营和下国际象棋这两项活动的流行原因。首先，露营是一个让人放松的活动，人们可以一起做早餐，白天游乐，夜间休息得很好，因此选项A（放松）是正确的。其次，许多年轻人因为《哈利·波特》电影开始喜欢国际象棋，明星们如Bono、Moby和Sting也喜欢下棋，他们玩得很好，这点吸引了更多年轻人追随。因此推断出Sting的职业是歌手，答案为D（优秀的歌手）。最后，虽然提及了不同的爱好，但主要讨论的是露营和国际象棋，因此最适合作为文章标题的是“年轻人的爱好”，选C。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: My name is Su Su. I am 13 years old and I am from China. Families in China are usually small, with only the parents and one child. I live in Beijing with my parents. My father is a teacher and my mother is a nurse. I don't have any brothers or sisters, but I have many friends. My best friend is Shu Ling. My name is Kent. I am 15 years old and I was born in Thailand. In Thailand, families are usually very big and all the family members live together. There are twenty-nine people in my family: four grandparents, my parents, four brothers, two sisters, two uncles, two aunts, and twelve cousins! We are farmers and we all live on the farm. 

(1) 题目内容: Who is Su Su's best friend? 选项: A. Shu Ling. B. Her cousins. C. Kent. D. Her sisters.

(2) 题目内容: How old is Kent? 选项: A. Thirteen. B. Fifteen. C. Fourteen. D. Sixteen.

(3) 题目内容: What does the underlined word "members" mean? 选项: A. The name of the family. B. The name of a farm. C. A person's age. D. People in the family.

(4) 题目内容: What's the passage mainly about? 选项: A. Families in China. B. Different countries, different families. C. Families and jobs. D. Thailand and China.
ques_analyze:
【分析】 文章分别介绍了来自不同国家的两个孩子苏苏和肯特的家庭情况。
(1) 细节理解题。通过阅读可找到苏苏直接提到“我的好朋友是舒玲。”，由此可以得出结论苏苏的最好朋友是舒玲，答案选A。
(2) 细节理解题。肯特在文中表明“我今年15岁。”，故可以直接判断他的年龄为15岁，答案选B。
(3) 词句猜测题。从句子“在泰国，家庭通常都很大，所有家庭成员都住在一起。”可以推断出'成员'指的是组成家庭的所有个体，即“家庭成员”，答案选D。
(4) 最佳标题题。文章第一部分提到了中国的苏苏，第二部分提到了泰国的肯特，两个部分描述了不同国家中家庭的不同构成，因此“不同国家的不同家庭.”作为标题最为恰当，答案选B。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: The idea that “knowledge is wealth” is not a new one. However, this idea is being put into use in a creative way in public libraries across Japan. In 2010, the country’s public library, Shimonoseki City Library in Yamaguchi Prefecture, first carried out “reading bankbooks” in order to encourage people to read more. In each reading bankbook, the titles of the books that people have read are listed. The dates when the books are borrowed and are supposed to return are also included. Besides, the price of each book is also listed. This emphasizes the idea that knowledge is valuable. It also gives readers a sense of achievement for what they have read for free. The Shimonoseki City Library developed “reading bankbooks” with Uchida Yoko, a company that sells teaching tools. Since it first came out in 2010, the idea has become very popular. Today, it is also used in some primary and junior high schools as well. With reading bankbooks, people can put a price on knowledge. (1) 题目内容: Where was the idea of “reading bankbooks” first carried out in Japan? 选项: A. 在学校。 B. 在银行。 C. 在图书馆。 D. 在公司。 (2) 题目内容: Which of the following are listed in each reading bankbook? ①The dates when the books are borrowed. ②The titles of the books that people have read. ③The price of the books. ④The dates when the books are supposed to return. 选项: A. ①②③ B. ①②④ C. ②③④ D. ①③④ (3) 题目内容: What can we know about Uchida Yoko? 选项: A. 它是一个公共图书馆。 B. 它是一所小学。 C. 它销售教学工具。 D. 它销售珍贵书籍。 (4) 题目内容: What’s probably the final purpose of “reading bankbooks”? 选项: A. 建议人们在银行工作。 B. 帮助人们写书。 C. 鼓励人们购买更多书籍。 D. 让人们认识到知识的价值。 (5) 题目内容: On which page of a newspaper can we find the passage? 选项: A. 文化。 B. 科学。 C. 旅游。 D. 自然。
ques_analyze:
(1) 解析：细节理解题。从文章内容来看，日本首次实行'阅读存折'的地方是山口县的下关市图书馆，所以正确答案是C选项，在图书馆进行。
(2) 解析：细节理解题。阅读存折列出的内容包括借书日期、读过的书目和应归还的日期，并不包括书籍的价格需要支付给图书馆的细节，所以正确答案是B选项。
(3) 解析：细节理解题。文章提到内田洋行是一个与下关市图书馆共同开发“阅读存折”的公司，它的主营业务是销售教学工具，因此正确答案是C选项。
(4) 解析：推理判断题。根据文章内容，通过“阅读存折”，人们会更加意识到知识的价值，这就是其最终目的，所以正确答案为D选项。
(5) 解析：篇章结构题。文章介绍的是日本公共图书馆的一项创意活动，旨在让人们认识到知识的价值，因此这篇文章最有可能出现在报纸的文化版块，故正确答案为A选项。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: I have many things in common with my dad, like music taste and sense of humor. But reading isn’t one of them. I can spend a whole day on a book, but my dad can’t read a book for longer than about 5 minutes. He reads emails, websites and papers for work, but not books. He’s really busy. I think sitting down to read for just 15 minutes a day is a good way to relax. My dad is not the only person that avoids books. I know lots of people would rather relax on their computers or in front of the TV. But reading has lots of advantages. Firstly, it’s better for your eyes. Looking at screens can be very stressful for your eyes. You should avoid looking at screens for an hour before bed. Secondly, reading can send you to another world—I often forget the time or things around me! Reading is a great way to relax before you go to bed. You think more about the world of the book rather than the real world. You can be sent to a different world in a film or a TV show, but I think books do it better. I also enjoy reading what people are doing and finding out what they think. Reading gives you the chance to get to know hundreds of new people! It also teaches you to see things from other people’s point of view, and understand their decisions or opinions. With a book, you can know what a character is thinking or feeling—you really can be inside someone else’s head! So have a try! Take 15 minutes when you are waking up, going to bed, eating lunch, or having a coffee. Good luck and happy reading! (1) 题目内容: According to the passage, the writer’s dad __. 选项: A. likes books B. likes watching TV C. is busy with work D. likes delicious food (2) 题目内容: Which way does the writer think is good to relax? 选项: A. Doing sports. B. Reading for 15 minutes. C. Avoiding books. D. Playing computer games. (3) 题目内容: The underlined words another world in paragraph 3 refers to __. 选项: A. the real world B. the world in your dream C. the world in a book D. the world in a film or a TV show (4) 题目内容: What can we learn from the passage? 选项: A. A coffee can help you read better. B. Reading can help make many new friends. C. A book can help you teach yourself. D. Reading can help understand others better. (5) 题目内容: The writer probably thinks that reading is __. 选项: A. natural B. stressful C. valuable D. painful
ques_analyze:
(1) 题目涉及细节理解。通过文章首段'...但是我的爸爸看书的时间不超过5分钟。他工作时会看邮件、网站和报纸，但不会读书。' 可知作者的父亲不会花很长时间阅读书籍，他阅读的是与工作相关的电子邮件、网页和文档，而非书籍，说明他忙于工作。因此，正确答案为C。
(2) 关于放松的方式，作者在文章首段提出了自己的观点，'我认为，每天花15分钟坐下来读书是一个很好的放松方式。' 意味着作者认为每天坐下阅读15分钟是一个很好的放松方式。故选B。
(3) 对于划线部分'另一个世界'的词义猜测，根据第三段提供的信息'我常常忘记时间和周围的事物！阅读是睡前放松的好方法。你会更多地思考书的世界，而不是现实世界。' 可以推断出书中的世界让作者沉浸其中，忘记时间和周围的事物，因此'另一个世界'指的是书中的世界。故选C。
(4) 文章中关于阅读和理解他人的联系，在倒数第二段有明确陈述'看一本书，你可以知道一个角色在想什么、感觉什么——你真的可以进入别人的脑海！' 这表明通过阅读书籍，我们可以了解一个人物的想法和感受，从而更好地理解他人。故选D。
(5) 对于作者对阅读的态度，全文表达了作者对阅读的热爱，谈论了阅读的优势和个人感受，并鼓励人们每天阅读。由此可以推断作者认为阅读是有价值的。故选C。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Here is a charity sale for the poor kids in the mountain area. We’ll give away the money we raise in the charity sale. Come and see our things. Nick I have a music player. I have had it for half a year. It still works very well now. It stays with me whenever I feel sad. And I have <u>downloaded</u> some pop songs in it. I hope it can be with you when you are unhappy. It costs 180 dollars. Now, you can take it with 60 dollars. Karen I’d like to sell some of my books. I started to buy books when I was twelve years old. My favorite book is Treasure Island. I believe anyone like me will learn a lot from this book. Each book only costs 20 dollars. You can get the second at half price. Mandy I have some soft toys to sell. The toy bear is my fourteenth birthday present. I have had it for one year. It still looks very new. Its original price is 50 dollars. You only need to pay 15 dollars for it now. Other toys are very new but cheap, too. (1) 题目内容: What may Nick do when he isn’t happy? 选项: A. Read fiction. B. Listen to music. C. Play with toys. D. See movies. (2) 题目内容: The underlined word “下载” in this passage means “__” in Chinese. 选项: A. 下载 B. 演唱 C. 制作 D. 删除 (3) 题目内容: Nancy will pay __ dollars if she buys two books from Karen. 选项: A. ten B. twenty C. thirty D. forty (4) 题目内容: Who may get the money raised from the charity sale? 选项: A. A disabled man in hospital. B. A poor family with four kids. C. A homeless man from the countryside. D. The poor kids in the mountain area. (5) 题目内容: Which of the following is NOT true? 选项: A. The three kids sell different things. B. Karen learns a lot from Treasure Island. C. Sarah can buy the music player at half price. D. There are some pop songs in Nick’s music player.
ques_analyze:
(1) 细节理解题。从Nick的描述中可知，他有一个音乐播放器，这个播放器在他感到难过时陪伴着他。因此，可以推断Nick在不开心的时候会听音乐。故选B。
(2) 词义猜测题。根据Nick提到的音乐播放器里已经下载了一些流行歌曲，我们可以理解这里的'下载'指的是将歌曲下载到播放器中。在中文中，下载对应的是'下载'。故选A。
(3) 推理判断题。Karen说每本书20美元，第二本半价。所以第一本书20美元，第二本书半价即10美元，共计30美元卖给Nancy。故选C。
(4) 细节理解题。根据文章的开头，我们知道这次义卖的目的是为山区的贫困儿童筹款。所以筹集的资金将会给予他们。故选D。
(5) 推理判断题。分析文中每个人卖什么，确定每个人卖的物品不同；再结合解析得知，Karen从书中学到很多；根据Mandy的描述，可以确定玩具熊不是以半价出售的，而是以更低的价格出售的，因此，Sarah不能以半价购买音乐播放器。故选C。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: People believe that Huck Finn is based on a childhood friend of Mark Twain’s. In fact, Twain was not alone in basing a fictional character on a real-life person. Severus Snape/John Nettleship Severus Snape is a skillful wizard teaching magic in Harry Potter. The writer, J. K. Rowling, once said that the character was based on a teacher of hers. The teacher was thought to be John Nettleship, who taught Rowling chemistry. At first, Nettleship felt surprised. "I know I am a strict teacher," he said. "But I don’t think I am as bad as Snape!" After a while, however, he said that he was so ill-tempered that most of his students avoided making him mad. Also, he used to wear long hair and have an untidy lab. That sounds familiar to Harry Potter fans. Alice/Alice Liddell Famously, Lewis Carroll’s Alice in Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland is based on Alice Liddell. Carroll was close to the Liddell family. One day, ten-year-old Alice asked Carroll to tell her a new story. Carroll began to create his famous tale of Alice and what happened after she fell through the rabbit hole. The little girl liked the story so much that she asked him to write it down. And the rest is history. Dill/Truman Capote In To Kill a Mockingbird, Harper Lee based Dill on her childhood friend, Truman Capote. Capote once said, “Lee was my best friend. Have you ever read To Kill a Mockingbird? I’m a character in that story! The story takes place just in the town where we lived!” (1) 题目内容: What does the underlined word “ill-tempered” mean? 选项: A. Calm B. Indecisive C. Bad-tempered D. Kind (2) 题目内容: What made Carroll decide to create Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland? 选项: A. Alice Liddell’s request B. His great interest in history C. His experience of travelling D. Alice Liddell’s adventure (3) 题目内容: Being a character of To Kill a Mockingbird, Truman Capote felt __. 选项: A. Proud B. Unsatisfied C. Surprised D. Nervous (4) 题目内容: The text is mainly about __. 选项: A. Purposes of writing fictional stories B. Famous writers of different fictional stories C. Introductions to famous writers’ childhood friends D. Characters of fictional stories from real-life persons
ques_analyze: 本文是一篇说明文，主要介绍了几个基于真实人物而创作的虚构故事人物。(1) 词义推测题。根据上文可知John Nettleship的学生们都避免惹怒他，推断出他脾气不好，因此下划线词“ill-tempered”意思是“脾气暴躁的”。结合选项，答案是C。 (2) 细节理解题。根据文中描述可知爱丽丝·李德尔请求路易斯·卡罗尔讲一个新故事，最终促使卡罗尔创作《爱丽丝梦游仙境》，因此选项A正确。 (3) 推理判断题。从文中可以看出杜鲁门·卡波特为成为《杀死一只知更鸟》中的一个角色感到自豪，因此答案是A。 (4) 主旨大意题。通读全文可知，文章主要介绍了真实人物如何成为虚构故事角色的灵感来源，因此选项D最符合。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目描述: My name is Lorena. I am 10 years old. I am French and I have two brothers, Peter and Paul. They are in the same middle school and are good at math and science, often helping me with my homework. I love going to school and my favorite subject is music. I am currently learning to ride a bike. Today I will go to a party. My friend Lisa will have a birthday party. Lisa likes reading, so I bought her a good book last week. Yesterday my grandpa called me. He is a nice man, tall and fun, and I love him very much. He lives in a beautiful town with my grandma. My grandma is 70 years old, but her hair is still black. She is an active woman who likes swimming, running, and riding a bike on weekends. She is also a good cook, and I love her food. My mom works in an office and my dad is a doctor. Our house is not very big, so my brothers share a bedroom. I have my own bedroom, small but tidy. Every summer we go to the beach, and I enjoy my free time swimming and playing with my family.

(1) 题目: What subject does Lorena like best? 选项: A. Math B. Science C. Music

(2) 题目: What will Lorena do today? 选项: A. She will go to a party. B. She will buy a gift for Lisa. C. She will call her grandpa.

(3) 题目: What can we know about Lorena’s grandma? 选项: A. She is tall. B. She lives in a town. C. She runs every day.

(4) 题目: What did I buy for Lisa last week? 选项: A. A bike. B. Some food. C. A good book.

(5) 题目: Which of the following is TRUE about Lorena? 选项: A. She goes to the beach every summer. B. She often goes to her mom's office. C. She lives in a big and tidy bedroom.
ques_analyze:
这篇记叙文介绍了罗蕾娜的个人信息、家庭成员、学校生活和她对家庭生活的喜爱。通过细节和推理可以找到答案。
(1) 根据文中'我最喜欢的科目是音乐'可以得知音乐是罗蕾娜最喜欢的科目。答案选C。
(2) 根据'今天我要去参加一个派对'，说明罗蕾娜当天会去参加一个派对。答案选A。
(3) 根据'他和我奶奶住在一个美丽的小镇'，说明罗蕾娜的奶奶住在一个小镇。答案选B。
(4) 文中提到'丽萨喜欢阅读，所以我上周给她买了一本好书'，揭示了丽萨上周获得了一本书作为礼物。答案选C。
(5) 根据'每年夏天我们都会去海边'，我们知道罗蕾娜每个夏天都会去海边。答案选A。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: Hey, Gina, this is Tom. I found a dictionary in the school library. It’s red and I think it’s yours. Please call me. Here is my friend Paul’s room. I can see some balls and books in it. Oh, a computer is in his room too. He likes playing computer games. Mr. Miller lost his wallet. Some cards and money are in it. He must find it. E-mail him at greatmiller@hotmail.com. Is this pencil box Linda’s? No, it isn’t. It’s Mary’s. A pen, a ruler and three pencils are in Linda’s pencil box. In Mary’s pencil box, there are only two pencils and one ruler. This is a picture of Jack’s schoolbag. There is one ruler and five pencils in it. How many notebooks are there in his schoolbag? Seven notebooks. Are these all Jack’s? No. Two of them are his brother John’s. 

(1) 题目内容: What is in Paul’s room? 选项: A. A schoolbag, a ruler and pencils. B. Balls, books and a computer. C. A wallet, a notebook and a dictionary. D. Cards, money and a watch. 

(2) 题目内容: What did Mr. Miller lose? 选项: A. A wallet. B. A dictionary. C. A computer. D. A notebook. 

(3) 题目内容: Whose pencil box is it? 选项: A. It’s Gina’s. B. It’s Mary’s. C. It’s Tom’s. D. It’s Linda’s. 

(4) 题目内容: Where did Tom find the dictionary? 选项: A. In his room. B. In the classroom. C. In his schoolbag. D. In the school library. 

(5) 题目内容: How many notebooks are there in Jack’s schoolbag? 选项: A. Two. B. Seven. C. Five. D. Four.
ques_analyze:
【分析】
1. 根据题目描述“这是我朋友保罗的房间。我可以看到一些球和书籍。哦，他的房间里还有一台电脑。”可以得出保罗的房间里有一些球、书和一台电脑。因此第一个问题答案是B。
2. 在题目中明确提到“米勒先生丢失了他的钱包”，因此可以确定米勒先生丢的是钱包，所以第二个问题答案是A。
3. 根据“这个铅笔盒是琳达的吗？不，不是。它是玛丽的。”可以确定铅笔盒是玛丽的。所以第三个问题答案是B。
4. 从“我在学校图书馆找到了一本字典。”可以得知汤姆是在学校图书馆找到的字典，所以第四个问题答案是D。
5. 关于杰克书包里有多少个笔记本，题目中直接给出了信息“七个笔记本”，所以杰克书包里有7个笔记本。所以第五个问题答案是B。

本文主要通过仔细阅读每一段描述来找出每个角色物品的具体情况，从而得出准确的答案。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Mr. Brown was talking to John about his future. John told Mr. Brown that if he were as tall as Bob, he would work hard to become an athlete; if he were as strong as Jack, he would be a policeman; if he were the same age as Jim, he would leave school to work. Mr. Brown thought John was not a fool, but he always got "D" in his exams, so he thought John was lazy and suggested he learn from his friends — Nick, Alice, Peter, and Maria. John said Nick liked science, Alice wanted to be an actress, Peter was good at math and would become a businessman, and Maria had a beautiful voice and would become a singer. Mr. Brown asked John what he really wanted to be, and he replied that he wanted to be a cook. (1) 题目内容: What did Mr. Brown and John talk about? 选项: A. The exams B. John’s friends C. John’s dream job D. John’s classmates (2) 题目内容: Bob was __ than John. 选项: A. stronger B. fatter C. taller D. older (3) 题目内容: John didn’t do well in the exams because he was __. 选项: A. too young B. ill C. a fool D. lazy (4) 题目内容: Peter did well in __. 选项: A. science B. math C. P.E. D. music (5) 题目内容: John told Mr. Brown he wanted to be a __. 选项: A. scientist B. worker C. teacher D. cook
ques_analyze: 首先，根据文章内容，Mr. Brown 和 John 讨论了未来职业这一主题，John 表达了自己的梦想工作，因此第一个问题的答案选 C。其次，对于第二个问题，文章中提到如果 John 和 Bob 一样高，他会努力成为运动员，由此可以判断 Bob 身高超过 John，因此答案为 C。第三个问题的答案在文中清晰指出，虽然 John 不是傻子，但他的考试成绩总是 'D'，他被认为是懒惰的，所以答案是 D。接着，第四个问题中 Peter 擅长数学，打算成为商人，因此 B 为答案。最后，第五个问题，John 对 Mr. Brown 说他想成为厨师，所以正确答案是 D。这些都是根据文章细节得出的直接结论。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: When Sarah was one year old, her mother died. Fortunately, she had a good father. Her father was a wealthy man who owned a coal mine and was her only relative. He doted on her and regarded her as his most precious treasure. Normally, it was hard for rich girls to have good behaviors, but it was not difficult for Sarah. At the age of seven, her father sent her to a school in London. There, she wore beautiful clothes. She was kind, beautiful, helpful, and gentle, just like a real princess. Soon, everyone in the school loved her. But then bad things happened. Her father suddenly died of a serious disease. Without her only relative, little Sarah felt very sad. She had to move into a cold, dark, and damp house. Her food was cold and bad. What was worse, she was often insulted by others, including the headmaster. In spite of this, she still smiled at everyone and never gave up her hope for life. Sarah remained confident, brave, helpful, and kind-hearted just like before. Later, with the help of her father’s friends, she finally became successful and regained happiness. I was deeply moved after reading the book "A Little Princess," written by an American woman writer named Frances Burnett. Since it was published, the book has moved millions of people. I hope more people will read this book. Word Bank: mine 煤矿, princess 公主, insulted 辱骂, In spite of 尽管 根据材料内容选择最佳答案。 

(1) 题目内容: What can we know from paragraph 1? 选项: A. Sarah’s father died shortly after she was born. B. Sarah was born in a wealthy family. C. Sarah’s father was a headmaster. D. People said Sarah was not like a princess. 

(2) 题目内容: What does the underlined phrase “doted on” mean in Chinese? 选项: A. 留恋 B. 珍藏 C. 赡养 D. 宠爱 

(3) 题目内容: Which is TRUE according to the passage? 选项: A. The headmaster treated Sarah well all the time. B. Sarah’s father died from an accident. C. Sarah once lost her hope for life. D. Sarah was always brave, helpful, and confident. 

(4) 题目内容: Which is NOT mentioned according to the last paragraph? 选项: A. Frances Burnett was a woman writer. B. A Little Princess was published. C. A Little Princess was translated into ten languages. D. A Little Princess was loved by millions of people. 

(5) 题目内容: Why did the writer introduce the book "A Little Princess" to us? 选项: A. Because he wanted us to read it. B. Because he wanted to sell the book. C. Because Burnett asked him to do so. D. Because he was Sarah’s friend.
ques_analyze: (1)解析：这是一个细节理解题。第一段提到'Sarah出生在一个富裕的家庭'，即'She had a good father. Her father was a rich man. He owned a coal mine'，因此选项B正确。
(2)解析：这是一个词义猜测题。下划线词组'doted on'在文中与表达'He regarded her as everything to him'相连，这表明他非常宠爱她，因此对应的中文词是'宠爱'，选项D正确。
(3)解析：这是一个推理判断题。根据文中的描述'She was nice, beautiful, helpful and gentle'以及'Sarah was confident, brave, helpful and kind-hearted'可以判断，Sarah始终保持勇敢、乐于助人和自信，因此选项D正确。
(4)解析：这是一个推理判断题。文章的最后一段并没有提到《A Little Princess》被翻译成十种语言，因此选项C是正确的，因为它没有在文章中被提及。
(5)解析：这是一个主旨大意题。作者在文章最后写到'I hope more people will read this book'，表明作者介绍《A Little Princess》的目的是希望更多的人去阅读这本书，所以选项A正确。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Peter Tabichi is 37 years old. He is from Kenya, Africa. He is a math and science teacher. His school is in a poor area. It’s small, but the classes are very big—there are about 58 students for every teacher. The school has only one computer. But Mr. Tabichi always makes his classes interesting and helps his students study well. He is kind and friendly to his students. His students say he is like a father to them. Mr. Tabichi comes from a family of teachers. He doesn’t just work on school days. He also works after school and on weekends to give students extra help. He goes to the students’ homes and gives them more help. He really likes his job. In 2019, Mr. Tabichi got the Varkey Foundation Global Teacher Prize. He gives lots of his money to help his students and other people. (1) 题目内容: Peter teaches __. 选项: A. math and history B. English and science C. math and science D. science and history (2) 题目内容: Peter’s school has only one __. 选项: A. teacher B. computer C. library D. TV (3) 题目内容: What do Peter’s parents do? 选项: A. Doctors. B. Workers. C. Farmers. D. Teachers. (4) 题目内容: What does Peter do on the weekend? 选项: A. He works at home. B. He plays computer games. C. He watches TV at home. D. He goes to his students’ homes. (5) 题目内容: The second paragraph mainly tells us __. 选项: A. Peter’s parents are both teachers B. Peter’s students like him very much C. Peter likes being a teacher D. Peter’s students are very poor
ques_analyze:
(1) 对于这道细节理解题，答案来自文中的直接信息：'Peter Tabichi is a math and science teacher.' 可以推断出彼得教授的是数学和科学，答案是C选项。
(2) 这道题同样是细节理解题，可通过原文中的信息得出答案：'The school has only one computer.' 因此学校只有一台电脑，答案是B选项。
(3) 这一题可以通过文中的这句话找到答案：'Mr. Tabichi comes from a family of teachers.' 这意味着他来自一个教师家庭，因此答案是D选项。
(4) 对于彼得周末的活动，这一句话给出了答案：'He also works after school and on weekends to give students extra help.' 进一步补充说他会去学生家里帮助他们，所以答案也是D选项。
(5) 第二段的主旨是，通过内容和'He really likes his job.' 这句话可以得出彼得非常喜欢他的教学工作，因此答案是C选项。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: When you are learning English, listening, speaking, and writing are important, but reading can also be very helpful. When you read, you can not only learn some new words, but also learn how to use these English words. Reading can provide a good example for writing. Good reading tips: Try to read material that you can understand. If you need to stop every three words to use a dictionary, it becomes uninteresting. Try to increase the number of your new words. If there are four or five new words on a page, write them in your notebook. But you don’t have to write them down while you read. Instead, try to guess their meanings as you read: mark them with a pen. Then come back when you have finished reading to look them up in a dictionary and write them in your vocabulary book. Then try to remember them. Try to read regularly. For example, read for a short time once a day. Fifteen minutes every day is better than two hours every Sunday. Fix a time to read and keep to it. You could read for fifteen minutes when you go to bed, or when you get up or at lunchtime. Read what interests you. Choose a book or a magazine about a subject that you like, because you are going to spend time and money reading it. So, choose an interesting book. You can also read newspapers. There are many English newspapers in China. For example, 21st Century Teens. It is easy enough for you to understand, and there is something interesting in it. (1) 哪一句是正确的？选项：A. Reading a lot can help you write better. B. When you read, you can only learn some new words. C. It is interesting to stop every three words to use a dictionary. D. Try to read something that you can’t understand to make your English better. (2) 如果你在阅读时遇到几个新单词，你应该__。选项：A. Give up reading B. Guess the meanings at first C. Write them down at once D. Look them up in a dictionary at once (3) 为了更好地阅读，你应该__。选项：A. It’s enough for you to read 21st Century Teens B. Only read a magazine about a subject that you like C. You should read something that you like for a short time once a day at least D. Reading English for two hours every Sunday is much better (4) 这篇文章主要讲__。选项：A. What to read B. Reading is very helpful C. When to read D. How to make reading better
ques_analyze: 本文主要讲述了提高英语阅读技巧的方法，其中包括四点建议：1. 选择合适自己水平的阅读材料，能够基本理解的内容会更加有趣，避免频繁查字典导致阅读兴趣降低。2. 在阅读过程中遇到新词，可以先猜测它们的意思，然后在阅读结束后查找字典并记录在词汇本上以便记忆。3. 定期阅读，建议每天读一小段时间，相比集中在周末长时间阅读更为有效。4. 选择自己感兴趣的阅读材料，这样可以提高阅读的积极性和参与度。综上，(1) 从句子“当你阅读时，它为写作提供了一个很好的示范。”得知阅读可以作为写作的好榜样，因此多阅读有助于提高写作水平。(2) 根据句子“相反，试着在阅读时猜测它们的意思”得知在阅读时应试着首先猜测新词的意思。(3) 文中建议“每天读一小段时间”表明每天都应该阅读一段时间。(4) 本文的主旨是介绍如何通过阅读提高英语水平，因此“如何提高阅读”更符合全文的主旨。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: For boys and girls, books are not all. They can find time to play at home or at school. Playing is about having fun. But how do they play? It doesn't mean watching TV or playing computer games. In the morning, they can run with their parents to be healthy. They can play sports with friends after school. They can also do some relaxing things after class. For example, they can draw or play chess with their classmates. It is also fun to help others. Playing can make children happy and they can feel great. It can also help students get on well with others. Play well and then you can learn well. (1) 题目内容: Playing is about __. 选项: A. working hard B. drawing C. keeping quiet D. having fun (2) 题目内容: The underlined word “It” refers to __. 选项: A. Playing B. Reading C. Studying D. Helping (3) 题目内容: From the passage, what can children do in the morning to play? 选项: A. Watch TV. B. Learn math. C. Run with parents. D. Play computer games. (4) 题目内容: __ is not all to children. 选项: A. Playing B. Books C. Watching TV D. Playing computer games (5) 题目内容: Which is right? 选项: A. Playing makes children very tired. B. Learn well and then you can play well. C. Children can’t play at school. D. It's fun to help others.
ques_analyze:
【分析】文章主要讨论了孩子们除了看书之外的玩耍活动以及玩耍的重要性。
(1) 解析：依据文中句子 '玩耍是关于享受乐趣的。'，可以看出孩子们玩耍的目的是为了享乐，故答案选D项。
(2) 解析：通过理解上下文 '玩耍是关于享受乐趣的。但他们如何玩耍呢？它 并不意味着看电视或玩电脑游戏。'，显然‘它’指的是'玩耍'，所以答案为A项。
(3) 解析：根据文章内容 '早上，他们可以和父母一起跑步以保持健康。'，可以确定孩子们早晨可以和父母跑步，故答案为C项。
(4) 解析：文章开头就指出 '对于男孩和女孩来说，书本并不是全部。'，所以答案为B项。
(5) 解析：文章提到 '帮助别人也是一种乐趣。'，说明帮助别人是一件非常有趣的事情，因此答案选D项。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: My name is Li Hao. I have a good friend. Her name is Emma. She is 13 years old. She has black hair and wears glasses. She is a nice girl with big eyes and a round face. She is tall and thin. She likes pink and has five pink dresses. She has a big sister named Grace, who is a teacher. Frank is Emma’s cousin. He often wears a red and black coat and a pair of sports shoes. He likes black and looks cool in his coat. Emma, Frank, and I are in the same grade but in different classes. Emma is in Class Six, Grade Seven. Frank and I are in Class One. Frank does well in English, and I am good at Chinese. We often help each other. (1) 题目内容: What is the relationship between Grace and Emma? 选项: A. 朋友 B. 学生 C. 表姐 D. 姐妹 (2) 题目内容: What does Frank often wear? 选项: A. 白黑相间的外套 B. 大眼镜 C. 红黑相间的外套 D. 一双运动鞋 (3) 题目内容: What color does Frank like? 选项: A. 蓝色 B. 黑色 C. 红色 D. 白色 (4) 题目内容: What is Li Hao good at, and what is Frank good at? 选项: A. 李浩擅长英语，弗兰克擅长语文 B. 格蕾丝擅长语文，弗兰克擅长英语 C. 李浩擅长语文，艾玛擅长英语 D. 李浩擅长语文，弗兰克擅长英语
ques_analyze:
本题要求根据文章内容选择正确答案。
 (1) 根据文章中的信息'她有一个姐姐，名叫格蕾丝'，可以知道格蕾丝是艾玛的姐姐，她们是姐妹关系，因此正确答案为D。
 (2) 从文章中提取信息'他经常穿着红黑相间的外套和一双运动鞋'，可以判断出弗兰克会穿运动鞋，所以正确答案是D。
 (3) 文章提到'他喜欢黑色'，明确指出了弗兰克喜欢的颜色是黑色，因此正确答案为B。
 (4) 根据文中信息'弗兰克英语很好，我擅长语文'，可以推断出李浩语文学得好，弗兰克英语好，答案选项为D。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: Mary is writing an email to her __. 选项: A. sister B. parents C. teacher

(2) 题目内容: Mary is going to the __ right now. 选项: A. school B. hospital C. cinema

(3) 题目内容: There are __ passengers on the bus. 选项: A. eight B. seven C. nine

(4) 题目内容: What are most of the passengers doing? 选项: A. Dozing B. Shaving C. Reading

(5) 题目内容: Which of the following is TRUE? 选项: A. It’s Saturday today. B. Susan is Mary’s sister. C. Mary doesn’t like the buildings in Chicago.
ques_analyze:
【分析】本文是Mary写给其父母的邮件，当前她在芝加哥学习，并描述了她在公交车上的情景，以及在芝加哥的生活。她提供了联系方式，并希望父母与其联系。
(1) Mary开头写到了 '亲爱的爸爸妈妈'，这表明邮件是写给她的父母的，因此答案为B。
(2) Mary提到她正在去学校的公交车上 ('on the bus to school')，因此答案是A。
(3) 文中提到公交车上有其他七位乘客（'seven other passengers'），加上Mary本人，总共有八名乘客，所以答案是A。
(4) 在描述公交车上的情况时，Mary说六名乘客在打瞌睡（'Six of them are sleeping'），所以答案是A。
(5) 通过Mary询问她的妹妹Susan的情况，并使用'我的妹妹Susan'这样的表述，我们可以得知Susan是Mary的妹妹，因此答案是B。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: Hello, I'm Alan. I'm fourteen years old and I attend Canyon Middle School in America. I have classes from Monday to Friday, but not on weekends. I typically eat breakfast at 8:00 AM, enjoying some bread and milk. My classes begin at 8:50 AM. My friend Lisa sits in front of me, while Peter sits beside me. We have three lessons every morning, including English and math. In the afternoon, we usually have a PE lesson and often play basketball, which I love the most. I find history and geography challenging and don't enjoy them. After school, I usually head straight home. In the evening, I like watching TV.

(1) 题目内容: What does Alan typically have for breakfast?  
选项: A. bread B. milk C. both bread and milk  

(2) 题目内容: Alan's class begins at <u>　　　</u>.  
选项: A. 8:00 AM B. 8:30 AM C. 8:50 AM  

(3) 题目内容: What subjects does Alan usually have in the morning?  
选项: A. English and Science. B. English and Math. C. Geography and Math.  

(4) 题目内容: Why doesn’t Alan enjoy geography?  
选项: A. Because it's too detailed. B. Because it's very simple. C. Because it's hard.  

(5) 题目内容: Which of the following statements is TRUE?  
选项: A. Alan studies six days a week. B. Lisa, Peter, and Alan are classmates. C. Alan's favorite subject is Art, but he dislikes History.
ques_analyze:
【分析】这篇文章是Alan介绍他的基本信息、日常生活及学习情况的自述。
(1) Alan早餐喜欢吃面包和喝牛奶。文章中明确地说了'I enjoy some bread and milk for breakfast.'，因此答案为C。
(2) Alan的课程在8:50开始。根据文章中的'My classes begin at 8:50 AM.'可知课程是从8点50分开始，所以答案为C。
(3) Alan早上通常有英语和数学课。文中提到的'We usually have English and math in the morning.'，所以选择B。
(4) Alan不喜欢地理是因为它很难。根据文章中的'I find history and geography challenging and don't enjoy them.'，所以答案为C。
(5) Lisa、Peter和Alan是同班同学。从文中的'My friend Lisa sits in front of me, while Peter sits beside me.'可以得知他们在同一间教室上课，因此答案为B。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Summer is a great time to improve your child's reading! Reading over the summer can help your child keep up his reading gains during the past school year and also help him prepare for the next year!How to sign up: We are inviting you to sign up for free to help your child be an active reader this summer! *Visit www.Readfun.org* Select "Parent" (NOT "Teacher")* Click on the blue "Sign Up" buttonWhat we provide: We provide you with thousands of free, high-quality articles with questions and activities. To make summer reading easy, we have selected interesting and knowledge-filled articles of different levels. You can visit www.Readfun.org/summer-reading to download and print the articles for free.How to use:TIP 1: Articles for summer reading should be accessible, so be sure to choose articles at your child's reading level. Don't be afraid to start with articles of lower grade levels. The important thing is that he reads, reads, reads!TIP 2: It's also important to help your kid develop good reading habits. Help him/her keep a good record of his/her summer reading. Besides, encourage him/her to discuss what he/she has read with family members. That way, you will all have a good time.We wish you and your family a great summer! (1) 题目内容: The first two sentences of the text above are about __.选项: A. different types of books B. the coming school year C. the importance of summer reading D. good places for summer reading (2) 题目内容: The underlined word "accessible" in the text means "easy to __".选项: A. write B. discuss C. understand D. compare (3) 题目内容: The text above is written to __.选项: A. introduce a reading project B. sell books to school kids C. encourage parents to read more D. share reading experience
ques_analyze: 本文是一篇说明文，旨在介绍一个帮助孩子在暑期积极阅读的免费活动。解答第一个问题时，分析开头两句话提到暑期阅读的重要性，因此正确答案为C。第二个问题需要通过上下文猜测下划线词的含义，从后面的句子'be sure to choose articles at your child's reading level'可以判断'容易理解'意味着'理解容易'，所以答案为C。第三个问题，根据文中内容‘help your child keep up his reading gains’可以判断整篇文章的目的是介绍一个阅读活动，所以答案是A。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: This is my new school. It is big and beautiful. There are 65 classes, 300 teachers, and 3,500 students in the school. In the middle of the school, there is a tall building for us to have classes. All the classrooms are there, and there are also some small rooms for the teachers to work. In front of the tall building, there is a smaller one, which is the library. There are many books there. The teachers and the students like to read books there. Sometimes they borrow books from it. There is a dining hall behind the tall building. Some of the students have lunch there. I like my new school very much. (1) 题目内容: My new school is __.选项: A. big B. small C. old D. tall (2) 题目内容: There are __ students in this school.选项: A. 3,200 B. 3,500 C. 3,800 D. 4,000 (3) 题目内容: The tall building in this school is for students to __.选项: A. read books B. play games C. have classes D. have lunch (4) 题目内容: The underlined “there” refers to __.选项: A. the classrooms B. the offices C. the dining hall D. the library (5) 题目内容: The tall building is __ the dining hall.选项: A. behind B. near C. in front of D. next to
ques_analyze:
通过文段细节，我们可以逐步解答五个不同的问题。
(1) 对于第一题，文段中提及'它既大又美丽'说明学校的大小，答案选A '大的'。
(2) 第二题的答案在文段中明确给出，'学校里有65个班级、300位教师和3500名学生'直接指出学校有3500名学生，所以选项B '3500'正确。
(3) 第三题，文段中说明了高楼的用途 '一栋高楼...供我们上课使用'，这意味着学生在这栋高楼中上课，答案因此是C '上课'。
(4) 第四题要求考生根据上下文猜测画线单词 '那里' 的指代，紧接着的句子'那是图书馆' 和 '教师和学生都喜欢在…阅读书籍' 提示我们，'那里' 指的是图书馆，也就是D选项 '图书馆'。
(5) 第五题，文中直接提到 '高楼的后面有一个餐厅'，意味着高楼位于学校餐厅的前面，这就是C选项 '前面'。
综上，每个答案都可以通过文段内容来直观、合理地推导出来。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容:    This is Scott. He has an interesting job. He works at a radio station. His radio show is from twelve o’clock at night to six o’clock in the morning. He sings well. He usually gets up at seven thirty at night. He brushes his teeth and takes a shower at ten past eight. Then he eats breakfast at nine. That’s a funny time for breakfast! After that, he usually exercises at about ten twenty. He goes to work by car at eleven o’clock. It often takes him ten minutes to get to the radio station. So he is never late for work.  
(1) 题目内容: Where does Scott work? 选项: A. 在火车站 B. 在汽车站 C. 在电台 D. 在警察局  
(2) 题目内容: How does Scott go to the radio station? 选项: A. 坐地铁 B. 坐公交 C. 开车 D. 走路  
(3) 题目内容: When is Scott’s radio show? 选项: A. 从 8:00 到 12:00 中午 B. 从午夜12点到早上6点 C. 从下午1:15 到 6:25 D. 从中午12点到下午6点  
(4) 题目内容: How many minutes does it often take Scott to get to the radio station from home? 选项: A. 50 B. 10 C. 15 D. 20  
(5) 题目内容: When does Scott take a shower? 选项: A. 九点半 B. 八点一刻 C. 八点十分 D. 八点前十分钟
ques_analyze:
【分析】本文介绍了Scott的工作和生活习惯。
(1)细节理解题。根据原文描述，Scott在电台工作：“He works at a radio station.”故选C。
(2)细节理解题。根据文章内容“...by car at eleven o'clock. ... takes him ten minutes to get to the radio station.” Scott是自己开车去工作的，因此选择C。
(3)细节理解题。文章中清楚地提到Scott的电台节目时间：“His radio show is from twelve o'clock at night to six o'clock in the morning.”因此B是正确选项。
(4)细节理解题。文章提到“...to get to the radio station...”; 他通常花10分钟到电台，所以B选项是正确的。
(5)细节理解题。根据描述，他在八点十分洗澡：“He brushes his teeth and takes a shower at ten past eight.”故此C选项正确。
考点：细节理解。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Hello, my name is Liu Jia. I'm 12 years old. I'm in No. 3 Middle School. I have a happy family. My dad, mom, sister, and I are in my family. My dad is a Chinese teacher. His name is Liu Yun. He teaches Chinese in Yunlan Middle School. His telephone number is 628-5469. My mom is a teacher, too. Her name is Li Yan. She teaches English in my school. Her telephone number is 628-5587. And my sister’s name is Liu Ye. She is nine. She's in a primary school. My family has a dog. Its name is Lala. It's black and white. It’s my good friend. (1) 题目内容: __ people are in Liu Jia's family. 选项: A. One B. Two C. Three D. Four (2) 题目内容: __ are in No. 3 Middle School. 选项: A. Liu Jia and Liu Yun B. Liu Jia and Li Yan C. Liu Jia and Liu Ye D. Liu Jia and Lala (3) 题目内容: Li Yan's telephone number is __. 选项: A. 628-5587 B. 628-5469 C. 628-4578 D. 628-5598 (4) 题目内容: What's the best title of the passage? 选项: A. My Dog B. My School C. My Family D. My Dad and Mom
ques_analyze:
根据文章内容，依次解析每个问题：
(1)要找出刘佳家里有几口人，我们可以从刘佳的陈述“家里有爸爸、妈妈、姐姐和我”得知家里有四口人，包括爸爸、妈妈、姐姐和她自己，因此选择D。
(2)要确定谁在第三中学，可以根据刘佳说“我在第三中学上学”以及她妈妈李燕在“我的学校”教英语得知刘佳和她的妈妈都在第三中学，所以选择B。
(3)要查找李燕的电话号码，通过句子“她的电话号码是628-5587”找到答案，电话号码确实是628-5587，因此选择A。
(4)为文章选最佳标题，考虑刘佳提到“我有一个幸福的家庭”和文章围绕刘佳的家庭成员进行描述，这篇文章主要介绍的是刘佳的家庭，因此选择C。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容:    Sue is from the USA. She is 19 years old. I have a photo of her. Look! She is very tall and strong, and she has long arms and long legs. Her eyes are big and her nose is small. She is in a red T-shirt. She is a basketball star in the NBA. Her favorite color is yellow. She likes bananas and apples, but she doesn’t like oranges. How do you like her? (1) 题目内容: Where is Sue from? 选项: A. England B. the USA C. China (2) 题目内容: How old is Sue? 选项: A. 17 B. 19 C. 18 (3) 题目内容: What color is Sue’s T-shirt? 选项: A. Red B. Yellow C. Blue (4) 题目内容: What doesn’t Sue like? 选项: A. Apples B. Oranges C. Bananas (5) 题目内容: What does she look like? 选项: A. She is very short but strong. B. She has big eyes and a small nose. C. She has a wide mouth.
ques_analyze: 1. 关于Sue的国籍，依据原文“Sue 来自美国”，可得出答案为B。2. Sue的年龄在文中明确表示“她19岁”，所以正确选项是B。3. 她的T恤衫颜色通过“她穿着一件红色的T恤衫”，正确答案为A。4. 根据Sue的喜好，“但不喜欢橙子”，正确选项是B。5. 根据她的外貌描述“她的眼睛很大，鼻子很小”，对应B选项，答案为B。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容:    This is Jim. He is thirteen years old and from the USA. He is a student. He has a good friend named Jack. Jack is fifteen years old and from Canada. Jack is tall, but Jim is short. They are in the same school but in different grades. Jim is in Class Three, Grade Seven, and Jack is in Class Two, Grade Nine. They go to school at seven in the morning and go home at six in the afternoon.  
(1) 题目内容: Jim and Jack are __.选项: A. 来自同一个国家 B. 穿蓝色鞋子 C. 老师和学生 D. 来自不同的国家  
(2) 题目内容: Jim is __.选项: A. 矮的 B. 高的 C. 强壮的 D. 大的  
(3) 题目内容: Jim and Jack __.选项: A. 在同一个年级 B. 在不同年级 C. 同一个颜色 D. 同一个家庭  
(4) 题目内容: Jack is in __.选项: A. 一班 B. 三班 C. 二班 D. 五班  
(5) 题目内容: They go to school at __ in the morning.选项: A. 6:00 B. 7:00 C. 7:30 D. 8:00
ques_analyze: 本文是一篇记叙文，介绍了Jim和Jack的一些基本信息。1) 对于第一题，我们需要判断Jim和Jack是否来自同一个国家，根据原文中“他来自美国... 他来自加拿大”明确提到两人分别来自美国和加拿大，因此他们来自不同的国家。答案为D。2) 第二题要求我们界定Jim的身高，根据文中“Jim个子矮”直接描述了Jim的身高特征，即Jim较矮。答案为A。3) 第三题考查的是Jim和Jack是否在同一年级，文中提到“他们在同一所学校，但在不同的年级”，指出尽管他们在同一所学校，但是年级不同。答案为B。4) 第四题询问的是Jack所在的班级，原文“Jack在九年级二班”清晰地告诉我们Jack在二班。答案为C。5) 第五题关于他们上学的时间，原文“他们早上七点上学”说明了具体时间是早上七点。答案为B。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Miss Nancy is nineteen years old. She has curly brown hair and is of medium height. She likes children and loves her teaching work. From Monday to Friday, she stays at school and teaches. Although she has a lot of work to do every day, she often plays games with her students after school. Her students like her very much. On Sundays, she usually drives to her parents' house and stays with them, but sometimes she goes to see her friends. She drives back to school on Monday morning. She likes singing, dancing, and swimming, and she is a good teacher. (1) 题目内容: Miss Nancy is a __ teacher. 选项: A. popular B. music C. English D. Chinese (2) 题目内容: What does Miss Nancy look like? 选项: A. She has straight hair. B. She wears glasses. C. She is of medium height. D. She is very thin. (3) 题目内容: Sometimes Miss Nancy goes to see her friends __. 选项: A. every day B. on Sunday C. on Saturday D. on Monday (4) 题目内容: Miss Nancy usually goes out __. 选项: A. on a bus B. by bike C. by car D. on foot (5) 题目内容: Miss Nancy likes __. 选项: A. her work B. her students C. both A and B D. nothing
ques_analyze:
【分析】 本文描述了南希小姐的日常工作和生活。
(1) 根据原文中的'学生们都很喜欢她'，我们可以推测她是一位受欢迎的老师。正确答案为A。
(2) 关于南希小姐的外貌问题，文中提到“身高中等，卷曲的棕发”，所以答案是C。
(3) 根据“但有时她会去看望朋友”这一句，可以知道她有时在周日去看朋友，因此答案是B。
(4) 从“每周日她通常开车去父母家”这一句可以推断她通常以开车出行，所以答案为C。
(5) 文中提到“她很喜欢小孩子，也热爱她的教学工作”以及她喜欢唱歌、跳舞和游泳，所以答案是C。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Dear Tim, I come from Canada. Do you know I have a sister? Her name is Sally. She’s 14 years old. We don’t look the same. She’s tall with long blond hair like my mom. Her eyes are small. I’m short and I have short brown hair like my dad. My eyes are big. My sister and I are in the same school, but we are in different classes. She is in Class 5, Grade 7 and I am in Class 7, Grade 7. We’re good sisters and friends. What about you? Do you have sisters? Lisa Dear Lisa, I’m from Cuba. I have a sister, too. Her name is Alice. She’s the same age as your sister. She’s short and she has big blue eyes. She likes green best. She’s a student of Class 4, Grade 8 in an international school. Her English is very good and she can speak Chinese, too. She wants to go to China because she wants to see her favorite Chinese actor, Wang Kai. Tim (1) 题目内容: Sally is __. 选项: A. a student B. 13 years old C. short D. from Cuba (2) 题目内容: Who looks like Dad? 选项: A. Tim B. Sally C. Lisa D. Alice (3) 题目内容: How old is Alice? 选项: A. Twelve B. Thirteen C. Fourteen D. Fifteen (4) 题目内容: Alice’s favorite color is __. 选项: A. Green B. Blue C. Black D. Red (5) 题目内容: Which of the following statements is correct? 选项: A. Lisa and her sister are in different schools. B. Lisa and Alice have big eyes. C. Alice is in Class 3, Grade 7. D. Tim wants to go to China.
ques_analyze: (1) 细节理解题。根据Lisa的信中叙述“我和姐姐在同一所学校上学”，可以推断她的姐姐Sally在学校，即是一名学生。因此答案为A。
(2) 细节理解题。根据Lisa的信中描述“我比较矮，有一头棕色的短发像我爸爸一样”，可以确定‘我’指的是Lisa，并且她长得像爸爸。因此答案为C。
(3) 细节理解题。Lisa的信提到“我有一个姐姐,她的名字叫Sally。她今年14岁”，而Tim的回信中说“我也有一个姐姐。她和你姐姐同岁”，说明Alice和Sally一样是14岁。因此答案为C。
(4) 细节理解题。从Tim的信中我们得知“她最喜欢绿色”，表明Alice最喜欢的颜色是绿色。因此答案为A。
(5) 推理判断题。Lisa的信中说“我和姐姐在同一所学校上学”，表明Lisa和她的姐姐在同一所学校；另外她提到“我的眼睛很大”，而Tim提到Alice有“蓝色的大眼睛”，这表明Lisa和Alice都有大眼睛，因此B项正确。同时，从信中可以知道Alice是八年级四班学生，想去中国，这否定了C和D项。综上，正确答案为B。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: The square dancing (guang chang wu) has become a popular pastime among many old Chinese women. We can often see old women dancing in open areas in the city. Do you like this activity? Do your family members take part in it? People have different opinions about this kind of dancing. Let's take a look together!

Wang Junkang (China)
Many people are against square dancing because it creates too much noise. Many people can't have a good rest, so they want to stop it. But I think if they dance in a public square, there is no problem. But if they dance near apartment blocks and neighborhoods, the government should stop them, just like in many western countries.

Bebilzebub (UK)
Most of the old women get together to do some exercise. This is just their hobby. And they are enjoying it. I love cycling around a city and seeing people dancing. It's great, long may it continue. When I'm older, I'll learn to dance guang chang wu.

Smartnova (US)
I really hate it because I often experience it. The old women dance more than ten hours every day, often till midnight, on the ground of our apartment building with loud, noisy music. Do you want to live this kind of life with so much noise? It has become so popular now in the cities throughout China. We must do something to stop it at once!

(1) 题目内容: Where do old women often dance square dancing?
选项: A. In any places around them. B. Under the tall buildings. C. In open areas in the city. D. On the playgrounds.

(2) 题目内容: Why are many people against square dancing?
选项: A. Because it makes the city dirty. B. Because it makes babies cry. C. Because it makes the road crowded. D. Because it makes them not sleep well.

(3) 题目内容: What do we know from the third paragraph?
选项: A. Bebilzebub likes to teach square dancing. B. Bebilzebub likes to watch square dancing. C. Bebilzebub wants to take more exercise. D. Bebilzebub wants to dance square dancing.

(4) 题目内容: What has Smartnova ever experienced?
选项: A. The noise effect of guang chang wu. B. The usage of dancing guang chang wu. C. The help to the old woman. D. How to dance guang chang wu.

(5) 题目内容: Where can we see this passage?
选项: A. In an education magazine. B. In a children story book. C. In a page of website. D. In a fashion magazine.
ques_analyze: 这篇文章围绕不同人对广场舞的看法展开。首先，就老年妇女在哪里跳广场舞这个问题，文章指出她们在城市的开放空地跳舞，因此答案为C。关于为什么很多人反对跳广场舞，文章提到噪音影响了人们的休息，所以答案为D。第三段中，Bebilzebub表达了他喜欢看别人跳广场舞，选项B正确。Smartnova提到广场舞的噪音对他的生活造成影响，答案为A。最后，根据文章的风格和内容，适合发布在网站页面上，因此答案选C。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: People may have many different types of hobbies during the lifetime. When we are very young, we spend most of the time playing with toy cars. We may enjoy playing in a sandbox or building with wooden blocks. When we get older, we start our first real hobbies. Some kids go out for a sport like football or skating. These new interests can be quite time-consuming, and most children spend a lot of time on them. Some children might get interested in some quiet activities like reading, painting, or stamp collecting. Others might enjoy playing an instrument like the piano or the violin. As we get older, our hobbies might change or go on. Some people might spend their whole life on stamp collecting. Other people might change their interests every year. Some people are lucky because they have found jobs that are similar to their hobbies, like a person who loves teaching and becomes a teacher. (1) 题目内容: What does the underlined word “time-consuming” mean in the passage? 选项: A. 短时间的 B. 多次的 C. 费时的 D. 费钱的 (2) 题目内容: Which of the following is not a quiet hobby? 选项: A. Collecting stamps. B. Painting. C. Playing the piano. D. Reading. (3) 题目内容: What can be the best title of the passage? 选项: A. Hobbies and Jobs B. Jobs and Ages C. Quiet Hobbies D. Hobbies and Ages
ques_analyze:
本文是一篇说明文，主要阐述人在不同年龄阶段可能会有不同的爱好，并且这些爱好如何随着时间的推移而变化。
(1) 针对词义猜测题，根据上下文可以推断“这些新的兴趣可能会非常耗时，大多数孩子都会花很多时间在这些活动上。”因此，C 选项（费时的）是正确的。
(2) 针对细节理解题，根据文中提到的安静活动包括阅读、绘画和集邮，但弹钢琴经常伴随着较大的声音，不属于安静的爱好。因此，C 选项（弹钢琴）是正确的。
(3) 标题归纳题，从文章整体内容出发，最佳标题应概括全文主题，即爱好如何随着年龄的变化而变化。因此，D 选项（爱好与年龄）是最恰当的标题。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: One day when I was 12, my mother gave me an order—borrow at least one book from the library for the summer. This was one more way for her to solve my strange problem—inability to read. In the library, I found my way into the “Children’s Room.” I sat down on the floor and pulled a few books off the shelf. The cover of a book caught my eyes. There on the book’s cover was a beagle which looked the same as my dog. I had recently had a beagle. He was my best friend, but one morning, he was gone, given away to someone who had the space and the time to care for him. I never forgot my beagle. My eyes ran across the title, Amos, the Beagle with a Plan. Unknowingly, I had read the title. Without opening the book, I borrowed it from the library. Under a tree, I started to read about Amos. I read very, very slowly with difficulty. Though pages were turned slowly, I got the main idea of the story about a dog who, like mine, had been separated from his family and finally found his way back home. That dog was my dog, and I was the little boy in the book. At the end of the story, my mind continued the final scene of reunion, on and on, until my own lost dog and I were running together. My mother’s call returned me to the real world. I suddenly realized I had read a book, and I had loved reading that book. I never told my mother what happened that summer, but she saw a slow but remarkable progress in my classroom performance. And years later, she was proud that her son had read thousands of books. (1) 题目内容: Why did the writer’s mother tell him to borrow books? 选项: A. To encourage him to read more books. B. To help him solve his reading problem. C. To let him spend a meaningful summer. D. To make him learn more about the world. (2) 题目内容: What drew the writer’s attention? 选项: A. A book with a cover picture of a dog. B. A place named “Children’s Room”. C. The boy’s best friend called Beagle. D. The interesting story in the book. (3) 题目内容: What probably happened when the writer looked at the title? 选项: A. His eyes opened widely. B. He didn’t want to read. C. He could read it without difficulty. D. He tried very hard to understand the title. (4) 题目内容: Why could the writer manage to read the book through? 选项: A. He was forced by his mother to read it. B. The sad ending of the story attracted him. C. The book was easy enough for him to read. D. The book told a similar story of his own dog. (5) 题目内容: Which one could be the best title of the passage? 选项: A. My Mum’s order. B. My Happy Summer. C. How I loved Beagles. D. How I loved Reading.
ques_analyze:
【解析优化】
(1) 根据文中的“这是她解决我阅读困难的又一种方法”，我们可以知道，作者的妈妈让他借书是为了帮助他解决阅读问题。
(2) 文中明确指出“封面上有一只和我的狗一样的小猎犬”，这表明作者被一本封面上有狗的书所吸引。
(3) 从“我的目光扫过书名《阿莫斯：有计划的小猎犬》。不知不觉间，我已经读完了书名”可以推断，即使作者不太擅长阅读，他在不自觉中顺畅地读完了书名。
(4) 文中提到“这条狗就像是我的狗，而书中的小男孩就是我”，说明这本书讲了一个与作者自己狗非常相似的故事，这激励他坚持读完了这本书。
(5) 全文描述了作者如何通过一本书找到了对阅读的热爱。所以，最适合的标题是“我如何爱上阅读”。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Many people like animals. Nowadays, many people keep animals as pets. People usually like to have dogs, cats, fish, and other animals. Many young people keep animals because they find them interesting. Some old people have pets because they don't live with their children. Morris lives at No. 25 Garden Street. He is a doctor, but he helps dogs. People usually call him "The Dog Doctor". When dogs get sick, people call him on the telephone. He goes to their houses and gives the dogs the right medicine. Wherever he goes, he is always welcome. (1)题目内容: What kind of animals do people keep? 选项: A. Dogs. B. Cats. C. Fish. D. All of the above. (2)题目内容: Why do old people keep pets? 选项: A. Because they don't live with their sons or daughters. B. Because they don't have children. C. Because they think animals are very interesting. D. Because they don't like to go to the zoo. (3)题目内容: Morris helps __. 选项: A. cats B. dogs C. ducks D. pigs (4)题目内容: Where does Morris live? 选项: A. In a hospital. B. In a park. C. In a garden. D. In No. 25 Garden Street.
ques_analyze:
【分析】本文是一篇记叙文，主要介绍了人们喜爱养宠物的现象，并介绍了兽医Morris。
(1) 细节理解题。文章中提到‘人们通常喜欢养狗、猫、鱼和其他动物’，表明人们养狗、猫、鱼或者其他动物作为宠物。因此答案为D选项'以上所有'。
(2) 细节理解题。文章提到‘部分老年人由于不和子女一起生活，所以养有宠物’，解释了一些老人养宠物的原因是与子女不同住，由此可知答案为A选项‘因为他们不和儿女住在一起’。
(3) 细节理解题。根据句子‘他是一名医生，但他专门为狗治病’可以明确Morris帮助的是狗，因此答案选B‘狗’。
(4) 细节理解题。通过‘Morris住在花园街25号’明确了Morris的居住地点，选D‘在花园街25号’。
考查阅读理解和细节捕捉能力。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Mr. and Mrs. White had two sons and three daughters. One Sunday, Mrs. White said to her husband, "The children don’t have any lessons today, and you’re free too. There’s a new funfair in the park. Let’s all go there to play." Her husband said, "I want to finish some work today." Mrs. White said, "Oh, forget it. Go there and make our children happy. That’s the most important work." So Mr. and Mrs. White took their children to the funfair. Mr. White was forty-five years old, but he enjoyed the funfair more than his children. He hurried from one thing to another, and ate lots of sweets. One of the children said to her mother, "Isn't Dad just like a small child?" Mrs. White didn’t want to follow her husband around any more at that time and answered, "He is even worse than a small child, Mary, because he might spend more money than a small child." (1) 题目内容: There were __ children in the White family. 选项: A. two B. three C. four D. five (2) 题目内容: One Sunday, Mr. and Mrs. White wanted to go to __ with their children. 选项: A. school B. work C. a funfair D. a shop (3) 题目内容: Mr. White liked the place so much that he __. 选项: A. bought lots of sweets B. followed his wife all the time C. hurried from one thing to another D. asked a lot of questions (4) 题目内容: From the story we know Mrs. White __ when Mary asked her the question. 选项: A. was still excited to play B. was a little angry with Mr. White C. looked for Mr. White everywhere D. ate a lot of sweets (5) 题目内容: Of all the family members, __ enjoyed playing there most that Sunday. 选项: A. Mr. White B. Mrs. White C. Mary D. the boys
ques_analyze:
本篇文章是一篇记叙文。通过细节描述，我们可以了解到怀特一家五口在某个星期天去游乐场所发生的趣事。
(1) 细节理解题。根据句子'Mr. and Mrs. White had two sons and three daughters.'，可知怀特一家共有五个孩子，因此答案为D。
(2) 细节理解题。文章中提到了“Mrs. White said... 'The children don't have any lessons today, and you're free too. There's a new funfair (游乐场) in the park. Let's all go there to play.'”，而紧接着怀特先生和夫人带着孩子到游乐场了，因此答案为C。
(3) 细节理解题。根据怀特先生的行为描述“He hurried from one thing to another, and ate lots of sweets.”，显然他非常喜欢那里，因此答案为C。
(4) 推理判断题。由Mrs. White的话“He is even worse than a small child, Mary, because he might spend more money than a small child.”能够推断出她对怀特先生花钱过多感到有些不满，因此答案为B。
(5) 推理判断题。由文中“...he enjoyed the funfair more than his children. He hurried from one thing to another, and ate lots of sweets.”可见，在那个星期天，怀特先生比其他任何家庭成员都更享受游乐场，因此答案为A。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: People in the UK have various ways to spend their free time. They usually use this time to relax. They spend most of their free time at home. The most popular activity is watching TV. People in the UK watch TV for about 25 hours a week. They often record programs so they can watch them later. Reading is also a common way to spend free time. People in the UK spend a lot of time reading newspapers and magazines. Many people in the UK have pets, and they like playing with their pets in their free time. In summer, gardening is popular, and families often have a "day out" on the weekend. They like to go to a festival or see a show. Young people like to go to clubs, and people of all ages like to go to the cinema. In winter, "do-it-yourself" (DIY) is popular, and people often spend time repairing houses. Some free time activities are with friends, and the most common one is inviting friends for a drink or a meal at home. Sometimes, people and their friends have dinner in a restaurant. On the weekend, people in the UK like to do sports. The popular kinds of sports are soccer, horse racing, swimming, tennis, skating, climbing, and hill walking. (1) 题目内容: What is the favorite free time activity of people in the UK? 选项: A. 阅读. B. 做运动. C. 看电视. (2) 题目内容: __ is popular in winter in the UK. 选项: A. 园艺 B. 看表演 C. 修理房屋 (3) 题目内容: We can find __ kinds of popular sports in the passage. 选项: A. 5 B. 7 C. 6 (4) 题目内容: Which of the following is TRUE according to the passage? 选项: A. 英国人经常录制电视节目. B. 夏季英国人各个年龄段的人都喜欢去俱乐部. C. 英国人经常与朋友一起出游. (5) 题目内容: What is the passage mainly about? 选项: A. 英国人为何有大量的空闲时间. B. 英国人喜欢不同类型的活动. C. 英国人在空闲时间做什么.
ques_analyze:
本文介绍了英国人如何度过他们的空闲时间，并且列出了多种休闲方式。
(1) 细节理解题。文中提到，英国人每周大概看25小时电视，且表明看电视是最受欢迎的活动'The most popular activity is watching TV.'。因此，看电视是英国人最喜欢的空闲活动，选项C正确。
(2) 细节理解题。根据文中第三段的描述，在冬天，人们常常花时间修理房屋'In winter...People often spend their free time repairing (修理) houses.'，由此可知在英国的冬季，修理房屋受欢迎，选项C正确。
(3) 细节理解题。文中最后一段列举了七种受欢迎的运动项目'The popular kinds of sports are soccer, horse racing, swimming, tennis, skating, climbing and hill walking.'，因此共有七种受欢迎的运动，选项B正确。
(4) 细节理解题。文章第一段提出，英国人经常录制节目以便稍后观看'They often record (录制) programs, so they can watch them later.'，因此A项正确，意味着英国人经常录制电视节目。
(5) 主旨大意题。文章首尾呼应，介绍了英国人在空闲时间的多种休闲活动，由此可知主旨是讨论英国人的空闲时间活动，故选C。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: Tony __ at 6:30 in the morning.选项: A. gets up B. brushes teeth C. has breakfast

(2) 题目内容: Tony __ to school every day.选项: A. walks B. takes the train C. rides a bike

(3) 题目内容: At six o’clock in the afternoon, Tony __.选项: A. plays basketball B. plays ping-pong C. does his homework

(4) 题目内容: Tony doesn’t __ on that day.选项: A. do homework B. exercise C. watch TV

(5) 题目内容: From the passage, we know Tony is a __.选项: A. worker B. student C. teacher
ques_analyze:
【分步解析】
(1) 这是一道细节理解题。查看托尼的日程表，确定在早上6:30的活动；根据表格内容'6:30 a.m 起床'，很明确托尼在早上6点半起床。所以，正确答案是A。
(2) 同样是细节理解题。再次查看托尼的日程表，定位到7:15 a.m的活动；根据'7:15 a.m 骑自行车去上学'，可以直接看出托尼是骑自行车去学校的。因此，正确答案为C。
(3) 这是另一道细节理解题，参照日程表，寻找下午6:00的活动；根据表格中的'6:00 p.m 打篮球'，可以很清楚托尼在下午六点打篮球，因此应选A。
(4) 这个题目是细节理解题。无需找特定时间点，我们查看整个活动列表；因为在活动列表中没有提到'看电视'，说明那一天托尼没有看电视。所以正确答案是C。
(5) 最后一道题需要推理判断。通过分析'骑自行车去上学'和'做作业'这两项活动，我们可以推断托尼是一名需要上学和完成家庭作业的学生。所以正确选择是B。
【考点】细节理解和推理判断。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Everyone has a dream job and we all hope our dreams can come true. Mr. Black is a reporter at a TV station. He wants to know what jobs students are going to do when they grow up. Last Friday, he went to the Evergreen School to do a survey. Mr. Black asked the students to discuss with each other and then fill in the form with a pen, telling them to tell the truth. Mr. Black thought most students would choose to be teachers. The teacher is one of the best professions in the world. Maybe some students would choose to be scientists, as rich knowledge would help them. A few students might choose to be soldiers because they could protect the country and maintain peace. Mr. Black got help from the teachers before school was over, and they handed out one thousand five hundred questionnaires. When the survey results came out, Mr. Black and the teachers were surprised. Please look at the results. Profession Proportion Actor(actress) 35% Scientist 20% Sports Player 20% Teacher 10% Soldier 10% Farmer(or else) 5% (1) 题目内容: What is Mr. Black's profession? He is __.选项: A. a teacher B. an actor C. a reporter D. a soldier (2) 题目内容: Why did Mr. Black do a survey last Friday? 选项: A. Because he wanted to find a job for himself. B. Because he was always interested in doing a survey. C. Because he wanted to know about students' dream jobs. D. Because he wanted to know how much money students needed. (3) 题目内容: According to the survey, how many students want to be teachers in the future? 选项: A. 75 B. 150 C. 300 D. 500
ques_analyze:
【分析】Black先生进行了一项调查，旨在了解学生对未来职业的选择，结果显示演员职业最受欢迎。
(1) 根据文中信息“Mr. Black 是一名电视台的记者”，明确指出Mr. Black 是一名记者，故答案为C。 
(2) Mr. Black进行调查的原因在文中“他想知道学生长大后想从事什么工作”有明确陈述，因此答案为C。 
(3) 通过计算得出想成为教师的学生人数。已知发放的问卷总数是1500份，“10%”表示10%的学生想成为教师，据此计算1500×10%=150，表示150名学生希望将来成为教师，故答案为B。
总之，这个调查显示了学生们对职业的期望和梦想，有助于我们了解他们的职业取向。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Chinese young people love their smart phones. They use phone apps every day. But now, a book has let them temporarily put down their smart phones. The book is called Secret Garden, and it is a colouring book for adults. You don't need to read it because there are almost no words in the book. All the pages are pictures without colours. You just need to use colour pens to paint them. An artist in Britain created the book, and it is currently the best-selling book on www.amazon.cn. Last month, it sold 25,000 copies in China. Many young people bought this book. They like it so much that they stopped playing games or surfing the Internet on their smart phones. These people are mainly young mothers and workers. It is very difficult to take care of babies or do a good job at first, so they have a lot of <u>pressure</u>. Drawing the book can help them reduce nervousness. In the past, people thought colouring books were only for children. With Secret Garden becoming more and more popular, many young adults also begin to paint as a hobby. (1) 题目内容: __ made Chinese young people temporarily put down their smart phones. 选项: A. A game B. Housework C. A book D. Colours (2) 题目内容: __ are in Secret Garden. 选项: A. Many words B. Colour pictures C. Pictures without colours D. Colour pens (3) 题目内容: __ created the book. 选项: A. Chinese young people B. A Chinese artist C. A British artist D. British young people (4) 题目内容: What does the underlined word “pressure” mean in Chinese? 选项: A. 精力 B. 压力 C. 困惑 D. 责任 (5) 题目内容: How can people use the book? 选项: A. People can touch it. B. People can listen to it. C. People can taste it. D. People can paint it.
ques_analyze:
本文介绍了《秘密花园》这本书及其受欢迎的情况。
(1) 根据内容“一本书让他们暂时放下了手机”，明确提到是一本书让年轻人暂时放下了智能手机，书名正是《秘密花园》，故选项C正确。
(2) 根据“所有的页面都是没有颜色的图画”，可知《秘密花园》书中的图片都是没有颜色的，需要自己来涂色，所以选择C。
(3) 关于作者，文中直接提到“这本书由一位英国艺术家创作”，因此选项C正确。
(4) 对于划线词“压力”的中文含义，通过“他们有很大的压力”和前文提到的照顾孩子、工作的困难联系上下文，推断出此处“压力”指的是“压力”，这与选项B匹配。
(5) 关于如何使用这本书，“你只需用彩色笔给它们涂色”清晰地说明了人们需要用彩笔来绘画，D选项“可以为它涂色”与之相符，故选D。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Marty is a driver. He drives a taxi in New York City. He is very busy every day. He works six days a week from 5:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. He doesn't always eat lunch at lunchtime. He can't have a rest when he is tired because he is too busy. Driving is not easy. Traffic in the city is often busy. There are always many cars on the streets. He must always wait for green lights. Driving a taxi is also dangerous. When it rains or snows, the roads are slippery. Sometimes bad men steal the taxi driver's money. Most of the passengers are nice. They are friendly to Marty. Marty likes his job. He likes meeting different people, and he likes talking to them. Most of his passengers are visitors. They come to visit New York. They have a lot of questions about the city. Marty always feels happy when he tells his passengers about New York. He loves driving, and he loves talking about the city. (1) 题目内容: How long does Marty work every day? 选项: A. 10 hours B. 8 hours C. 12 hours (2) 题目内容: From Paragraph 2, we can learn that __. 选项: A. driving is interesting B. driving is relaxing C. driving is difficult (3) 题目内容: What does the underlined word “乘客” mean in Chinese? 选项: A. 助手 B. 老板 C. 乘客 (4) 题目内容: Why does Marty like driving? 选项: A. Because he likes talking to passengers. B. Because he likes visiting New York. C. Because he likes driving different cars. (5) 题目内容: The best title for the passage is __. 选项: A. A New York City taxi driver B. The busy traffic in New York C. Visiting New York by taxi
ques_analyze: (1) 细节判断题：根据文章描述'Marty每天工作六天，从早上5:30到晚上5:30'，马蒂每天从早上5:30工作到晚上5:30，因此他每天工作的时间是12小时。
(2) 段落理解题：文章中提到了'开车不容易，城市里的交通通常很繁忙'，说明城市中的交通通常非常繁忙，这表明开车存在困难，'开车很困难'与此相符合。
(3) 词义猜测题：'乘客'在文中是指乘坐马蒂出租车的人，结合上下文中'Marty是一名司机。他在纽约市开出租车'和他们对Marty友好的描写，可以判断'乘客'意味着'乘客'。
(4) 细节理解题：从'Marty喜欢他的工作。他喜欢见不同的人，也喜欢和他们交谈'可以得知，Marty喜欢他的工作，尤其是喜欢与不同的人见面并且与他们交谈。
(5) 标题归纳题：整篇文章讲述了Marty作为出租车司机在纽约的工作及他对工作的喜爱，'纽约市的出租车司机'最能概括文章主旨。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: Tony wants to share some of his habits with us.  
Living Habits  
Mondays, Wednesdays & Fridays: I usually get up at 6:00 a.m. At 6:30 a.m., I go running for an hour. After that, I take a shower and get ready for work. I leave home at 7:50 a.m. and walk 20 minutes to my office. In the afternoon, I usually arrive home from work at 6:30 p.m.  
Tuesdays & Thursdays: I get up at 7:00 a.m., do some housework, and then go to work.  
Weekends: I often go to the park with my friend. I also like to watch movies.  
Eating habits: I like healthy food such as fruit and vegetables. Sometimes, I have meat, and I like eating beef the most.  

(1) 题目内容: Tony在周一上午几时到达办公室？  
选项: A. 8:00 B. 8:10 C. 8:30  

(2) 题目内容: Tony一周有几天需要早起锻炼？  
选项: A. 5 B. 2 C. 3  

(3) 题目内容: 以下哪项陈述是正确的？  
选项: A. Tony喜欢健康食品，尤其是牛肉。 B. Tony通常在周末去电影院放松。 C. Tony在每个工作日早上坚持跑步一小时。
ques_analyze:
【解析】
本文介绍了Tony的生活和工作习惯。 
(1) Tony在周一离家时间是早上7:50，他步行到办公室需要20分钟，因此到达时间是7:50 + 20 = 8:10。选B。
(2) Tony在周一、周三和周五做晨跑锻炼，即一周有三天早起锻炼。选C。 
(3) 根据Tony的饮食习惯，他喜欢健康食品如水果和蔬菜，并尤其喜欢牛肉。因此选A。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: A great way for teens to cool off during the summer is at water parks. If you live near a water park, you might think about getting a season pass. This way you can go as often as you like. Check to see if there are any water parks around you. Many are indoor facilities. So even if it isn’t warm enough where you live to swim outdoors, you can enjoy swimming in a temperature-controlled area. The prices are usually good. For example, one ticket to Water World, a water park, is only 5 yuan. Some teens like to get a part-time job over the summer to make some pocket money. Older teens shouldn’t have much trouble finding jobs. An idea is to get some teens together to form your own summer job business. You can walk dogs, bring in the newspapers, feed the cats, collect rubbish, water flowers, etc. Being that it’s summer, many people go on vacation and could use someone to look after their houses while they’re away. You can also think about other jobs you can do for them. Teens love freedom. Sure you would like to get to such places as the mall, movie theaters, the zoo, the beach, and local amusement park instead of staying at home all summer. Then a summer bus pass will be helpful. Check to see if your area has one for you. Such a pass costs only 10 yuan for the whole summer. The price is reasonable and also your parents don’t have to always drive.

(1) 题目内容: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a part-time job for teens? 选项: A. Collecting rubbish B. Bringing in newspapers C. Walking dogs D. Washing cars

(2) 题目内容: If Sally goes to Water World with two friends, they should pay __. 选项: A. 15 yuan B. 10 yuan C. 20 yuan D. 5 yuan

(3) 题目内容: A summer bus pass is helpful for teens to __. 选项: A. find part-time jobs B. go out for fun C. go to summer classes D. do outdoor sports

(4) 题目内容: What is the text mainly about? 选项: A. Part-time jobs B. A summer bus pass C. Water park swimming D. Things to do in summer
ques_analyze: 本文是一篇记叙文，介绍了夏天青少年可以进行的活动。对于第一题，细节理解题，根据文中提到的遛狗、拿报纸、喂猫、收垃圾、浇花，可以排除这些选项。文中未提及洗车，因此D是正确答案。对于第二题，推理判断题。文中提到水上世界的票价为5元，所以Sally和两位朋友一共需要3张票，共需支付3*5=15元，答案选A。第三题，是细节理解题。文中提到公交乘车证可以帮助青少年到商场、电影院等地方去享受自由和娱乐，因此B是正确答案。第四题是文章大意题，整篇文章围绕青少年夏天的活动展开，包括水上乐园、兼职、使用公交通行证等，故选D。考点：细节理解；推理判断；文章大意。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: I am a movie fan, and I spend almost all my free time watching movies. There are many cinemas in my city, and I know them so well that my friends always ask me to choose a good one for them. The City Theater has the newest movies and the seats are very comfortable. The ticket prices are also <u>fair</u>, but it is the oldest cinema in town and it isn't open on Tuesday and Thursday. The Tianhe Cinema is the most modern cinema with the biggest screens. However, the service isn't very good, and people can't bring food or drinks into the cinema. They can only buy them inside the cinema, and the food and drinks are usually much more expensive than those outside. The Star Cinema is my favorite. It has the funniest movies and the seats are very comfortable. It is open every day, and if you go there on Monday and Wednesday morning, you can buy tickets at half price. It also provides free water, and its big hall can hold two hundred people at a time. Of course, the screens are really large. So I will invite my friends to see a film here on my birthday. I usually had a party before, but this year I'd like to do something different. (1) 题目内容: Which of the following is NOT true about the City Theater? 选项: A. The movies are the newest. B. It's very old. C. It is open every day. D. Its seats are very comfortable. (2) 题目内容: What does the underlined word “fair” mean? 选项: A. 不合理的 B. 合理的 C. 时髦的 D. 昂贵的 (3) 题目内容: Where should people buy drinks if they want to see a film at the Tianhe Cinema? 选项: A. Near the cinema. B. In the supermarket. C. In the cinema. D. In the restaurant. (4) 题目内容: How many cinemas does the writer talk about in this passage? 选项: A. One. B. Two. C. Three. D. Four. (5) 题目内容: What can't we know from the passage? 选项: A. The writer likes watching movies in his free time. B. The Tianhe Cinema has the biggest screens. C. The writer likes the Star Cinema best. D. The writer always invites his friends to watch a movie on his birthday.
ques_analyze: (1) 细节理解题：根据文章中提到的'it isn't open on Tuesday and Thursday'，可以判断出City Theater并不是每天都开放，因此C选项不正确。
(2) 词义猜测题：从句子'the prices of the tickets are also fair'中可以推测出，'fair'是指票价合理，因此选择B。
(3) 细节理解题：根据'They can only buy them inside the cinema'这句话，可以知道在Tianhe Cinema里只能在影院内部购买食物和饮料，因此选择C。
(4) 细节理解题：文中提到了The City Theater、The Tianhe Cinema和The Star Cinema三个电影院，因此答案为C。
(5) 推理判断题：最后一段提到作者今年计划在生日时邀请朋友看电影，这是不同于以往的庆祝方式，说明作者并不总是在生日邀请朋友看电影，因此D选项不正确。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: I work in a bank from Monday to Friday. My house is near a park and is about ten kilometers from my office. I usually go to work by train, I usually get up at 6:30 am and take the train at 7:00 am. It usually takes me about thirty minutes to get to my office. The train is quick and cheap. I am never late for work. —Anna

I am a student. My house is near a beautiful lake. My school is across from the lake. I can walk to school across a bridge. It takes me about thirty minutes. But I often go to school by boat, because it is more fun. It takes me about twenty minutes. —Joe

I am a <u>waitress</u>. I work in a restaurant from Monday to Saturday. I often go to work by bus. It is about five kilometers from my house to the restaurant. It takes me about twenty-five minutes to go to work. Sometimes I am late for work because the traffic is very busy. —Nancy

(1) 题目内容: Anna usually arrives at her office at about __. 选项: A. 6:30 am B. 7:00 am C. 7:30 am

(2) 题目内容: Joe often __ to school. 选项: A. takes a bus B. takes a boat C. takes a train

(3) 题目内容: Nancy lives about __ kilometers from her working place. 选项: A. five B. ten C. fifteen

(4) 题目内容: The underlined word “waitress” means __ in Chinese. 选项: A. 女警察 B. 女服务员 C. 女工人

(5) 题目内容: Joe lives near a __. 选项: A. lake B. river C. park
ques_analyze:
本文是一篇记叙文，通过安娜、乔和南希的叙述介绍不同的工作以及他们的上班路程和交通方式。
(1) 根据安娜的描述，她早上6:30起床，7:00乘火车，火车行程用时大约30分钟。因此，6:30加上1小时是7:30，可得出安娜大约7:30到达办公室，答案为C。
(2) 从乔的叙述中得知，他经常通过乘坐船去学校，'经常乘船去学校'明确指出了这一点，故答案是B。
(3) 南希提到，她的住处到餐厅大约是五公里的路程，直接说明了距离，所以答案为A。
(4) 关于'女服务员'这个词，南希说她在餐馆工作，由此可以推测出'女服务员'意思是女服务员，答案为B。
(5) 最后，根据乔提到的，他的家附近有一个美丽的湖泊，直接提供了答案，故选A。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容:    This is a Chinese boy, and his name is Bob. He is 10 years old. He is in No. 8 Middle School, and his English teacher is Miss Li. She is a good teacher. Bob likes her very much. (1) 题目内容: Bob is__.选项: A. Chinese B. British C. American D. Australian  (2) 题目内容: His English teacher is__.选项: A. Mr. Li B. Miss Zhao C. Miss Li D. Miss Liu  (3) 题目内容: Bob likes__ very much.选项: A. his father B. his mother C. his English teacher D. his classmate  (4) 题目内容: Bob is__.选项: A. 8 years old B. 9 years old C. 11 years old D. 10 years old  (5) 题目内容: He is in__ Middle School.选项: A. No. 2 B. No. 8 C. No. 7 D. No. 18
ques_analyze: 【分析】这篇文章提供了有关鲍勃的信息，包括他的国籍、学校、年龄和他的英语老师。(1)根据文章的第一句话“这是一个中国男孩，他的名字是鲍勃”，可以确定鲍勃是中国人，因此答案是A。(2)由句子“他的英语老师是李老师”明确指出鲍勃的英语老师是李小姐，因此答案是C。(3)从“鲍勃非常喜欢她”可以判断鲍勃非常喜欢他的英语老师，故答案为C，“她”在文中指代的是李老师。(4)通过“他10岁了”得知鲍勃的年龄是10岁，所以正确选项是D。(5)最后由“他在第8中学”可知鲍勃在第8中学，因此答案是B。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容:    David and Ben are good friends. They both like swimming. David could swim one year ago, but Ben couldn’t. With the help of David, Ben can swim very well now. They often go swimming in the swimming pool. They also often play ping-pong on the playground. David couldn’t play it at all at the age of seven, but now he can play it very well. David can play the piano, too. He couldn't do it last year, but this year, he can do it very well. Ben could dance just a little before, but now he can dance well, even dance to disco. 根据短文内容判断正（T）误（F）。作答类型为T/F（对/错）1. Ben could swim one year ago. 2. David and Ben often go swimming in the swimming pool. 3. David could play ping-pong when he was seven years old. 4. David couldn't play the piano one year ago. 5. Ben could dance to disco now.
ques_analyze:
通过文章的仔细阅读可对每一个判断题做出分析如下：1. 根据文中的叙述'但那时Ben不会'得知一年前Ben不会游泳，因此第1题正确答案是F。2. 由句子'他们经常一起去游泳池游泳'可以判断，David和Ben确实经常去游泳池游泳，所以第2题正确答案是T。3. 在文中有明确说明'David七岁时完全不会打乒乓球'表明七岁时David不会打乒乓球，故第3题正确答案为F。4. 根据文中'去年他还不会弹'我们知道David去年不会弹钢琴，所以第4题正确应该选T。5. 最后通过'现在他能很好地跳舞，甚至能跳迪斯科'表明Ben现在能很好地跳舞并且能跳迪斯科，因此第5题正确答案是T。
通过上述分析，我们可以确定每个题目的答案及其依据，以确保学生能够理解每一步判断的来源。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content:
题目内容: From December 2016, foreigners in Chengdu can apply for a free Chengdu Public Library card. With their passports, they can apply for foreign reader cards at Chengdu Public Library. With the card, they can borrow books from 21 public libraries, including Jinjiang Library and Wuhou Library. The following are the borrowing rules: ●4 books, 4 magazines, and 1 CD or 1 DVD at a time for 30 days. ●Return books/magazines/CDs/DVDs to any Chengdu public library. ●0.1 yuan per day for each overdue book/magazine/CD/DVD. ●Chengdu Digital Library is available at sso.cdclib.org. 1F Children's readings Weekdays 13:30—17:30 Weekends and holidays 9:00—17:30 2F Story books about China Monday to Saturday 9:00—20:30 3F Digital Library 4F Newspapers 5F Books in foreign languages Monday to Friday 9:00—17:00 Sunday closed 6F Local documents

(1) 题目内容: Tom from America will get a foreign reader card with his passport in __. 选项: A. Jinjiang Library B. Wuhou Library C. Chengdu Public Library

(2) 题目内容: According to the library rules, Tom can read the e-books __. 选项: A. at sso.cdclib.org B. only in Chengdu Public Library C. in any Chengdu public library

(3) 题目内容: Tom borrowed 4 magazines and 2 DVDs, and they are overdue for 5 days. He should pay __ yuan for them. 选项: A. 0.6 B. 2.2 C. 3

(4) 题目内容: Tom can go to the library on __ if he wants to get some Local documents. 选项: A. Friday, 14:00 B. Saturday, 15:00 C. Sunday, 16:00

(5) 题目内容: On the 2nd floor, Tom can read __. 选项: A. Chengdu Daily B. Oliver Twist in English C. Journey to the West
ques_analyze:
【分析】文章主要介绍了在成都的外国人如何申请成都公共图书馆借书证及相关规则。
(1) 细节理解题。根据文中“他们可以在成都公共图书馆申请外国读者卡。”，明确指出外国人仅可在成都公共图书馆凭护照申请外国读者卡，故答案为C。
(2) 细节理解题。根据“成都数字图书馆网址为sso.cdclib.org。”，说明成都数字图书馆的电子书可在sso.cdclib.org网站上阅读，故答案为A。
(3) 推理判断题。按照“每逾期一天，每本书/杂志/CD/DVD罚款0.1元。”，逾期费用是每日每件0.1元，计算4本杂志和2张DVD逾期5天的费用：(4+2)×0.1×5=3元，因此需要支付3元，故答案为C。
(4) 细节理解题。根据“地方文献，周一至周五9:00—17:00。”，当地文件只能在工作日获取，故星期五下午14点可以，答案为A。
(5) 推理判断题。题干中2楼提及了“中国故事书”，《西游记》是典型的中国故事书，因此C项正确，故答案为C。

England B. America C. China (2) 问题内容: We can call Zhang Qiang at __.选项: A. 570102 B. 66534902 C. 89667144 (3) 问题内容: He is interested in __.选项: A. traveling B. singing C. drawing (4) 问题内容: He can speak __ languages.选项: A. 1 B. 2 C. 3 (5) 问题内容: We can’t find Zhang Qiang’s __ in the form.选项: A. address B. age C. experience
ques_analyze:
这是基于张强个人信息卡的细节识别问题。阅读这类信息卡时，我们需要仔细观察小细节。
(1) 第一个问题是询问张强的来源国。根据卡片上的“国籍：中国”，所以选择C。
(2) 第二个问题是关于如何联系张强。电话号码在信息卡上列为“(0898) 66534902”，因此B选项是正确的。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: All the four books are about __.选项: A. children’s daily activities B. ten questions about COVID-19 C. fighting against COVID-19 D. love between family members, friends, and everyone (2) 题目内容: The spread of the virus is mentioned in __. ①A Special Spring Festival ②Virus, Virus. You Cannot Scare Me! ③Ten Tips to Fight Monsters ④A Brief History of Viruses for Children选项: A. ①②③ B. ①②④ C. ①③④ D. ②③④ (3) 题目内容: According to the passage, which one is true?选项: A. The books were only translated into Japanese, French, and Russian. B. It is clear that we have won the war against COVID-19 completely. C. Children can learn to do something to protect themselves in a fun way. D. All the children can understand the virus based on reason and science.
ques_analyze:
【分析】 本文介绍了四本与如何对抗新冠病毒相关的书。
(1) 细节理解题。开篇提出问题“如何应对COVID-19？”并介绍了几本相关书籍，表明所有书籍的主题都是抗击新冠病毒。选择C（抗击COVID-19）符合这一信息。
(2) 细节理解题。通过书籍内容分析：‘病毒，病毒。你吓不倒我！’介绍了病毒传播和自我保护；‘特别的春节’讨论了COVID-19的传播方式；‘儿童病毒简史’包含了关于病毒传播的‘COVID-19十问十答’部分。因此，选择B（①②④）正确，因为‘特别的春节’（①）、‘病毒，病毒。你吓不倒我！’（②）和‘儿童病毒简史’（④）都提到了病毒传播。
(3) 推理判断题。结合‘病毒，病毒。你吓不倒我！’一书的内容，孩子们可以通过有趣的方式学习病毒传播和自我保护，选择C（孩子们可以通过有趣的方式学习保护自己）是正确的。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: David’s favorite subject is music, because he thinks it is interesting. He likes Monday and Tuesday, because he has music on these days. Tim is David’s brother. His favorite subject is P.E. He thinks it is easy and enjoyable. He is healthy, and his favorite day is Monday. Ellen is Tim’s cousin. Her favorite subject is art. She thinks it is interesting. Her school has an art festival in May. Her favorite day is Friday. 根据短文内容判断正（T）误（F）。 作答类型为T/F(对/错) 1. David’s favorite subject is music, because he thinks it is interesting. 2. Tim’s favorite subject is art. 3. David’s brother thinks P.E. is easy and enjoyable. 4. Ellen is David’s brother. 5. Ellen’s favorite subject is art.
ques_analyze: 1. 通过分析题目中的相关描述，根据句子'David最喜欢的科目是音乐，因为他觉得它很有趣。'，可以确定David最喜欢的科目是音乐，且原因是因为他觉得它很有趣，所以答案为T。 2. 通过查看Tim的信息，文中明确表示'Tim最喜欢的科目是体育'，而不是美术，所以第二题的答案为F。 3. 对于Tim的态度，文中的描述为'Tim觉得体育简单又愉快。'，可以确定他说的简单且愉快指的是体育，所以答案为T。 4. 题目中给出Ellen与David的关系描述: 'Ellen是Tim的表妹。'，由此可知Ellen是Tim的表妹，而非David的兄弟，答案为F。 5. 根据文中'Ellen最喜欢的科目是美术。'，可以确认Ellen最喜欢的确实是美术，所以这一点是正确的，答案为T。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: A Support Workers Do you have the ability to care for others? Can you understand how older people feel? Are you a good communicator? Do you have good listening skills? Can you work on weekends? If you have answered YES to the above, we would like to hear from you. - Starting rate of £8.56 per hour - Free uniform - Excellent training opportunities careers@golden-care.com B Trainee Hairdresser Full Time, 40 hours per week You will work 40 hours a week: Monday to Saturday. Your responsibilities will include: welcoming clients, washing hair, bringing coffee and tea to customers, and keeping the salon clean and tidy at all times. No previous experience is necessary. Please apply NOW! cathy@cut-above.brighton.com C WOWEE MAGAZINE Writers Wanted! Wowee Magazine is looking for writers for its website. Pay is based on the number of people who read your articles. You may also receive free tickets to events and free products to test. This is a great opportunity to get valuable work experience. We want people who are: chatty interesting passionate skilled Contact us at info@wowee.com (1) 题目内容: 关于护理人员的招聘广告A中，以下哪项未被提及? 选项: A. 良好的沟通能力 B. 良好的倾听技巧 C. 丰富的知识 D. 照顾他人的能力 (2) 题目内容: 如果你申请美发学徒，你不能做什么? 选项: A. 洗头发 B. 保持环境整洁 C. 为顾客提供饮品 D. 每天工作8小时 (3) 题目内容: 如果你是WOWEE 杂志的作者，人们会在哪里看到你的文章? 选项: A. 在互联网上 B. 在报纸上 C. 在一些门票上 D. 在很多测试中
ques_analyze: 【分析】这是一份关于三个不同工作岗位的招聘广告的理解题。(1) 为了确定护理人员岗位未提及的内容，我们需要逐项检查广告中的要求。广告中提到“你是否具备照顾他人的能力? 你是一个沟通能力强的人吗? 你有良好的倾听技巧吗?”，因此选项A、B和D中的内容被提及了。而广告中并未提到需要“丰富的知识”，故正确答案是C。(2) 根据广告B提到的工作时间安排 “每周工作40小时：周一到周六”，可以计算每天的工作时间大约是6.7小时（40小时除以6天），这意味着不能每天工作8小时，因此正确答案是D。(3) 广告C明确提到“Wowee 杂志正在为其网站寻找撰稿人”，表明作为Wowee 杂志的作者，你的文章将在其网站上发布。因此正确答案为A。

subject: 初中英语
ques_content: 题目内容: Some teenagers think that newspapers are boring and only for adults, but that’s not true. There are many interesting stories in the paper. <u>You just need to make clear what you are looking for</u>. “I spend about half an hour reading newspapers every day,” said 15-year-old Gao Ming from Beijing. “I’m interested in things happening at school.” School news is just one kind of news story in newspapers.
